tokens.name: CLAIRE / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:

- **Limit Order:** Medium volatility (33.8% price change) → -2% to -5% (entered near market).  
- **Take Profit:** High volume ($24,757 > $10k) → +20% to +40% (aggressive exit due to liquidity).  
- **Stop Loss:** Medium volatility → -8% to -15% (protects against sudden dips).  
- **Time Frame:** High volume + stable momentum → 4h to 1day (allows for trend capture).
